FuncDef: The display netstream export template command displays export template information in which the packet version is set to V9 for IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flow statistics. The display netstream export template command displays export template information in which the packet version is set to V9 for IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flow statistics.
CLIs: display netstream export { ip | ipv6 | vxlaninner-ip } templateslot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the template for exporting IPv4 flow statistics.
-

Displays information about the template for exporting IPv6 flow statistics.
-

Displays information about the template for exporting VXLAN flow statistics.
-

Specifies the inner packet of the IPv4 type for VXLAN packets.
-

Specify slot to match.
The value is an integer or a character string. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display netstream export ip template slot 1
ExtraInfo: When the packet version for NetStream flow statistics is set to V9, the corresponding template must be exported to the NDA. If the NMS fails to parse flow packets, this command can be used to check whether template exporting is normal.
